query.name: group by title: count
query.oql: select title, count(partition) as n from authors A group by title: A.title
query.hql: SELECT title, count(*) FROM authors GROUP BY title

query.name: group by title: list
query.oql: select title, (select A from partition) as people from authors A group by title: A.title
query.hql: SELECT title, collect_list(name), collect_list(year) FROM authors GROUP BY title

query.name: group by title: years
query.oql: select title, (select year from partition) as values from authors A group by title: A.title
query.hql: SELECT title, collect_list(year) FROM authors GROUP BY title

query.name: Whole article entries grouped by number of authors
query.hql: SELECT size(authors), title, authors, affiliations, controlledterms FROM publications

query.name: List of articles published per author
query.oql: select author, (select P from partition) as articles from publications P, P.authors A group by author: A
query.hql: SELECT authorExp, title, authors, affiliations, controlledterms FROM publications LATERAL VIEW explode(authors) t1 AS authorExp ORDER BY authorExp

query.name: Find all articles (full entry) on a certain topic
query.oql: select P from publications P where "particle detectors" in P.controlledterms
query.hql: SELECT * FROM publications WHERE array_contains(controlledterms, "particle detectors")

query.name: Select authors having worked on a certain topic
query.oql: select distinct author from publications P, author in P.authors where "particle detectors" in P.controlledterms
query.hql: SELECT distinct explode(authors) FROM publications WHERE array_contains(controlledterms, "particle detectors")

query.name: Proficiency of authors on a certain topic
query.oql: select author, (select P from partition) as articles from publications P, author in P.authors where "particle detectors" in P.controlledterms group by author: author
query.hql: SELECT authorexp, title, authors, affiliations, controlledterms FROM publications LATERAL VIEW explode(authors) t1 as authorexp WHERE array_contains(controlledterms, "particle detectors") ORDER BY authorexp

query.name: Articles written by a certain student, with a professor
query.oql: select * from ( select article: P, (select A from P.authors a, authors A where A.name = a and A.title = "professor") as profs from publications P where "particle detectors" in P.controlledterms and "Stricker, D.A." in P.authors ) T having count(T.profs) > 0
query.hql: SELECT authors.name, authors.title, authors.year, t2.title, t2.authors, t2.affiliations, t2.controlledterms FROM ( SELECT * FROM publications WHERE array_contains(authors, "Stricker, D.A.") AND array_contains(controlledterms, "particle detectors")) t2 LATERAL VIEW explode(authors) t1 as author JOIN authors ON (authors.name = author and authors.title = "professor") ORDER BY t2.title

query.name: Articles with one professor author, one PhD author where the PhD author is older
query.hql: SELECT phds.title, phds.name as phdName, phds.year as phdYear, profs.name as profName, profs.year as profYear FROM (SELECT t1.id, t1.title, authors.name, authors.year FROM (select hash(title, authors) id, * from publications) t1 LATERAL VIEW explode(t1.authors) newTable AS authorsExp JOIN authors ON (authors.name = authorsExp and (authors.title = "PhD"))) phds JOIN (SELECT t2.id, t2.title, authors.name, authors.year FROM (select hash(title, authors) id, * from publications) t2 LATERAL VIEW explode(t2.authors) newTable AS authorsExp JOIN authors ON (authors.name = authorsExp and (authors.title = "professor"))) profs ON (phds.id = profs.id) WHERE (phds.year < profs.year) ORDER BY phds.title
